item.title: [PI] Help!
item.dc:creator: @Toxic95 Toxic95
item.description:
@Toxic95 wrote:

Hey, I’m trying to add a command where I can type ::openpf example, and it opens the character file: Example.txt. Help? Here’s all I can think of for the code sadly. 

	if (CommandEqualsIgnoreCase("OpenPF")) {
		Start (".\Data\characters\"+p.playerName);
	}

Read full topic
